column1: I have been using Estee Lauder's Pleasures for more than a decade. I know exactly how it smells and i also know how long it can last on me (like forever). Although this product smells like the real one, however it hardly lasted on me. Barely an hour and it fades away. My hubby has bought this same perfume for me and my mom like maybe 7 years ago from Singapore Airport and my mom still has it. I use it sometimes when i go over to her place and it smells the same and it lasts for at least 6 hours. I bought this product from Amazon because the seller was Amazon and i have full trust in them. But i think either this stuff is fake or has storage issues. Like i said even a 7 year old bottle can still smell the same and is able to last for a long time. I am so disappointed in Amazon. Never will i buy fragrance from Amazon even if they are the sellers.
